title: Comeback
paragraphs: Comeback is a gear primary ability in the Splatoon series. It grants a variety of bonuses to players for a short time after respawning.
This ability is active for the first 20 seconds starting after a respawn caused by getting splatted by another player.
While active, Comeback gives the user 12 AP in Splatoon or 10 AP in Splatoon 2 and Splatoon 3 of the following:

In Splatoon, with this ability active, the player can get 59 ability points of any of the abilities it grants if the rest of their gear is filled with it, exceeding the usual maximum of 57.
- ▲ While active, this ability will also give Special Charge Up.
- — An issue when Super Jumping was fixed, the effects of Comeback sometimes experienced a delay and activated too late.
- ▼ Decreased the amount of ability that is given while Comeback is active from 12 AP to 10 AP.
- — Fixed an issue where Comeback was also activating for respawns from the player falling off the stage or into water.
- The Squid Nordic's higher chance of rolling Quick Respawn can work well with Comeback.
